comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Copied to commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Ancient_City_of_Beejnuggu... Where is this place? I assume in India somewhere? Thanks for posting these!

comment.author: 61498590@N03
comment._content: I understand it's an impressive complex of ancient ruins in southern India. The modern spelling of these two places appears to be Vijayanagara and Kamalapura.

comment.author: 76513833@N00
comment._content: Yes. This is Vijayanagara (Hampi)  near Kamalapura village.  The photo pertains to Lotus Mahal. at the Janana enclosure, where you find the Elephant stable.

comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the info. Added photo to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vijayanagara#The_City
